strings.bet_warning_dialog_message: Пожалуйста, учитывайте  mining free при отправке транзакции. Т.е. данная сумма должна прийти на указанный кошелек целиком.
strings.wallet_error_message: Чтобы продолжить нужно указать адрес кошелька USDT
strings.instruction_main_description_first: The FUTURESCOIN service provides the opportunity to place bets on the rise or fall of cryptocurrency value. Bets are accepted in Russian roubles, as well as in Tether USDT cryptocurrency. Rate changes are monitored via the <font color="#3786FF">coinmarketcap.com</font> service
strings.instruction_definition_description: The participant is an app user placing a bet.        <br /><br />The organizer is a FUTURESCOIN service administrator.        <br /><br />Bet amount refers to funds transferred from the participant to the organizer to place a bet.        <br />Bet period is the amount of days over which the participant predicts a change in cryptocurrecny value (from 1 to 30 days).        <br /><br />Coins are cryptocurrency that bets are made on for a rise or fall in value.        <br /><br />Commission is the platform’s fee for providing the service (the commission is fixed and amounts to 1% of the bet amount).

instruction_definition_description_array.title: Participant
instruction_definition_description_array.content: The participant is an app user placing a bet

instruction_definition_description_array.title: Organizer
instruction_definition_description_array.content: The organizer is a FUTURESCOIN service administrator

instruction_definition_description_array.title: Bet amount
instruction_definition_description_array.content: Bet amount refers to funds transferred from the participant to the organizer to place a bet

instruction_definition_description_array.title: Bet period
instruction_definition_description_array.content: Bet period is the amount of days over which the participant predicts a change in cryptocurrecny value (from 1 to 30 days)

instruction_definition_description_array.title: Coins
instruction_definition_description_array.content: Coins are cryptocurrency that bets are made on for a rise or fall in value

instruction_definition_description_array.title: Commission
instruction_definition_description_array.content: Commission is the platform’s fee for providing the service (the commission is fixed and amounts to 1% of the bet amount).

strings.instruction_how_make_bet_description: On the app’s main screen choose a coin, indicate the bet period and click <font color="#3786FF">“Rise”</font> or <font color="#EB0F43">“Fall”</font> (depending on your chosen strategy)Next you will be redirected to a page for filling out additional settings, where you will need to indicate:   <br /> a) Bet currency   <br /> b) Bet amount   <br /> c) Online wallet<br /><br />To finish, click the button <font color="#3786FF">«Place a bet».</font><br /><br />Next please transfer the bet amount yourself.If using Russian roubles, go through a payment system. For <font color="#3786FF">Tether USDT</font>  cryptocurrency bets, transfer funds onto the cryptocurrency wallet.Once your payment has been processed, you will receive an email with information about the bet, on the address attached to your account.<br /><br />The letter will contain the following information:  <br />  a) Date and time the bet was placed  <br />    b) Date and time the bet was closed  <br />   c) Bet coin  <br />   d) Bet strategy  <br />   e) Bet currency  <br />   f) Bet amount<br /><br />At the end of the bet period, you will automatically receive the bet amount, with the profit or loss already taken into account, on the indicated return wallet, as well as an email with the bet results.
strings.instruction_how_make_bet_description_1: On the app’s main screen choose a coin, indicate the bet period and click <font color="#3786FF">“Rise”</font> or <font color="#EB0F43">“Fall”</font> (depending on your chosen strategy)
strings.instruction_how_make_bet_description_2: Next you will be redirected to a page for filling out additional settings, where you will need to indicate:
strings.instruction_how_make_bet_description_4: To finish, click the button <font color="#3786FF">«Place a bet».</font>
strings.instruction_how_make_bet_description_5: Next please transfer the bet amount yourself. If using Russian roubles, go through a payment system. For <font color="#3786FF">Tether USDT</font>  cryptocurrency bets, transfer funds onto the cryptocurrency wallet. Once your payment has been processed, you will receive an email with information about the bet, on the address attached to your account.
strings.instruction_how_make_bet_description_6: The letter will contain the following information:

instruction_how_make_bet_description_7.content: Date and time the bet was placed
Date and time the bet was closed

strings.instruction_how_make_bet_description_8: At the end of the bet period, you will automatically receive the bet amount, with the profit or loss already taken into account, on the indicated return wallet, as well as an email with the bet results.
strings.instruction_how_it_works_description: If the bet paid off – the participant is returned the bet amount, as well as the percent of the sum by which the cryptocurrency value changed during the bet period.  <br /><br />If the bet didn’t pay off, the participant is returned the bet amount, minus the percent of the sum by which the cryptocurrency changed during the bet period.  <br /><br />In any event, when calculating your returns, the FUTURSCOIN commission is automatically taken out.  <br /><br />For example :  <br /><br />You anticipate that Bitcoin (BTC) will fall in one day..  <br /><br />You place a bet of 1,000 roubles on its devaluation, at which moment Bitcoin’s base price is  $16,000  <br /><br />After one day, the price of Bitcoin falls by 30%, coming to $11,200  <br /><br />Thus, your profit comes to 29% of your bet: (30% for the coin’s devaluation - 1% commission), which amounts to 1000 r x 29% = 290 rThe next day, you will receive your initial bet of 1000 r and your winnings of 290 r, 1290r. in total.р.  <br /><br />If your prediction was wrong (if the price of BTC increases within one day after your bet), you will get your money 1000 r back – 31% of your bet (30% for the coin’s increase + 1% commission) = 1000r – 310r = 690r.

instruction_how_it_works_description_arr.title: If the bet paid off
instruction_how_it_works_description_arr.content: If the bet paid off – the participant is returned the bet amount, as well as the percent of the sum by which the cryptocurrency value changed during the bet period.

instruction_how_it_works_description_arr.title: If the bet didn’t pay off
instruction_how_it_works_description_arr.content: If the bet didn’t pay off, the participant is returned the bet amount, minus the percent of the sum by which the cryptocurrency changed during the bet period.

strings.instruction_how_it_works_description_1: In any event, when calculating your returns, the FUTURSCOIN commission is automatically taken out.
strings.instruction_how_it_works_description_2: You anticipate that Bitcoin (BTC) will fall in one day. You place a bet of 1,000 roubles on its devaluation, at which moment Bitcoin’s base price is $16,000 After one day, the price of Bitcoin falls by 30%, coming to $11,200 Thus, your profit comes to 29% of your bet: (30% for the coin’s devaluation - 1% commission), which amounts to 1000 r x 29% = 290 rThe next day, you will receive your initial bet of 1000 r and your winnings of 290 r, 1290r. in total.р. If your prediction was wrong (if the price of BTC increases within one day after your bet), you will get your money 1000 r back – 31% of your bet (30% for the coin’s increase + 1% commission) = 1000r – 310r = 690r.

strings.error_user_with_name_already_taken: Пользователь с тем же именем уже принят
strings.error_user_with_email_already_taken: Пользователь с тем же адресом электронной почты уже принят
strings.bitcoin_cash_30: Вы осуществляете ставку на повышение Bitcoin Cash через 30 дней
